general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University. It covers academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and nursing programs, administrative reports such as the Examination Annual Report and Academic Bank of Credits, and various student support services including counseling, skill enhancement, and health guidelines. Additionally, it mentions university structure, tenders, legal documents, and outreach activities like FM radio and international collaborations.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths after completing a course in basic sciences, including scientific positions in research institutes and industries, wildlife specialization, teaching roles, and specialized areas like stem cell research and embryology. It also encourages individuals to consider a career in basic sciences.
career_path.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Scientific position in Research Institutes based in India and abroad
• Wild Life specialists/ Indian Forestry Services
• Research Assistant/Associate/Scientific position in Industries/pharmaceutical companies
• Research Assistant/Associate/Scientific positions in R& D labs
• Teaching positions in various Institutes based in India and abroad.
• Stem cell researchers/Embryologists
• Laboratory experts in Diagnostic labs
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.

It also highlights initiatives in entrepreneurship, innovation, and media (FM radio).
